title: How to Make Organic Aphid Sprays

methods.name: Garlic, Onion and Soap Aphid Spray

steps.headline: Strain the blended mixture to separate the liquid from the blend.
Pour the liquid into a spray bottle.
Spray directly onto aphids.
steps.description: This will need to be repeated every few days over approximately one week.

steps.headline: Boil the nasturtium leaves and water in a saucepan for 15 minutes.
Strain the leaves out of the mixture and pour the liquid into a spray bottle.
Spray directly onto aphids every few days over a period of a week.

text: Garlic, Onion and Soap Aphid Spray Blend the ingredients on high.  Strain the blended mixture to separate the liquid from the blend.  Pour the liquid into a spray bottle.  Spray directly onto aphids. This will need to be repeated every few days over approximately one week. Nasturtium Spray Boil the nasturtium leaves and water in a saucepan for 15 minutes.  Strain the leaves out of the mixture and pour the liquid into a spray bottle.  Spray directly onto aphids every few days over a period of a week.
